data.title: Partners
data.meta_description: Sansay maintains strong partnerships with industry-leading infrastructure vendors. These partnerships enable Sansay to collaborate on new solutions, conduct testing of new releases of product, and work together to quickly resolve any interworking issues.
data.meta_site_name: Sansay - Software-based VoIP Infrastructure for Service Providers
data.text:
By proactively working with partners on interoperability, Sansay provides an added level of service assurance for our customers, enabling them to more rapidly deploy infrastructure and achieve service readiness.

Much of Sansayâ€™s success in interworking with partner and 3rd party equipment is a result of strict adherence to standards, excellent product engineering, thorough development testing, and wide commercial deployment. By starting with this strong foundation, Sansay interworking is simplified for both service providers and partner vendors.

Sansay infrastructure has been commercially deployed in production networks with the following equipment:

Sansay prides itself on its open approach for interoperability and success in working with numerous IP communications equipment and software vendors.

For partners interested in working more closely with Sansay, please contact us to find out more about testing, interop, and joint go-to-market programs.
